mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , USER_NM , NICKNAME FROM angmoa.COMM_USER_MST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PASSWORD = #{password} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE angmoa.COMM_USER_MST a JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID, MAX(LOGIN_FAIL) + 1 AS NEW_LOGIN_FAIL FROM angmoa.COMM_USER_MST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY USER_ID ) aa ON a.USER_ID = aa.USER_ID SET a.LOGIN_FAIL = aa.NEW_LOGIN_FAIL
